description: Roasting grapes brings out their sweetness, perfect with mozzarella and crisp baguette.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Grape,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Roasted Grape & Mozzarella Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the grapes on a baking tray, drizzle with oil and rosemary and roast for 20 minutes on the middle shelf of the oven.
Cut the baguette into bruschetta slices on the diagonal and place these on a baking tray. Bake for 56 minutes on the top shelf of the oven until crisp.
Add torn mozzarella to each bruschetta, top with sticky grapes and cracked black pepper and serve.
